channel.title: Error
channel.description:
Hello, When i open up a client the .bat document starts, but it´ll say± [size=9pt]Error: Could not find or load main class Jframe Press any key to continue. . .[/size] What can i do to fix this, i've allready tried to edit it and probably change the JDK into the JDK version i have, but there was nothing standing with ''JDK'' or something. I've tried alot of diffrent clients but only 1 of them worked... This one didn't work for me.
@echo off title SoulSplit java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
This one does work for me.
@echo off COLOR 09 title your server name here @echo Client Is loading...... @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause
Can anyone help me please? Thanks, Tim

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @timmy379 timmy379
item.description:
@timmy379 wrote:

Hello,

When i open up a client the .bat document starts, but it´ll say±
[size=9pt]Error: Could not find or load main class Jframe
Press any key to continue. . .[/size]

What can i do to fix this, i’ve allready tried to edit it and probably change the JDK into the JDK version i have, but there was nothing standing with ‘‘JDK’’ or something. I’ve tried alot of diffrent clients but only 1 of them worked…

This one didn’t work for me.

@echo off title SoulSplit java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

This one does work for me.

@echo off COLOR 09 title your server name here @echo Client Is loading...... @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause

Can anyone help me please?

Thanks,
Tim
